title: Siapa Buka Lampu
overview: A newly opened ‘Guest House’ went viral when it received reviews from many ‘Influencers’. But on the third night, the guest house began to disturbed by the Thai ghost ‘Nak Nak’. The owner of the guest house asked for the help of a married couple who are known for their ability to catch ghosts to help them. The situation became worse when the ghost ‘Anubell’ who had been caught in a previous case by the married couple escaped. This case was successfully solved when the married couple found out that the ghost that had been bothering them was the ex-wife of the owner of the guest house who had died 20 years ago.
